Authentication failures can happen due to several reasons. If we set the description to the header, we have to mention the correct reason for the failure.
IMO, we do not need the error and error_description in the header since the WWW-Authenticate header is meant to contain only the challenge.

This WWW-Authenticate header is already available in the WSO2 APIM. In the APIM, it displays both error and error_description along with the WWW-Authenticate header when authentication fails. And the error_description is set to "The access token expired". This implementation is exactly similar to the implementation in APIM.
Let's use existing constants for these? AUTH_SCHEME_OAUTH2, AUTHN_SCHEME_BASIC
Use proper variable name instead of 'v'
